original_text: Remember that you made me, like someone who uses clay to make things. Will you now make me become dust again? Remember that you made me, like someone who uses clay to make things. Will you now make me become dust again? Remember that you made me,
korean_text: 기억하옵소서 주께서 내 몸 지으시기를 흙을 뭉치듯 하셨거늘 다시 나를 티끌로 돌려보내려 하시나이까

sentences.original_text: like someone who uses clay to make things
Will you now make me become dust again?
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 이제 나를 다시 먼지로 만드시겠습니까?
